bill.summary: 1/13/1995--Introduced. Amends the Job Training Partnership Act to establish a program to assist discharged members of the armed forces to obtain training and employment as managers and employees with public housing authorities and management companies. Directs the Secretary of Labor to enter into a cooperative agreement with the nonprofit National Center for Housing Management to provide for such training and placement program. Authorizes appropriations.
